CallYourRepresentative.us Privacy Policy

This privacy policy covers the CallYourRepresentative.com website.

Like most websites, this website collects non-personally-identifying information that is needed to deliver this website and its contents to its visitors, such as browser type, language preference, referring site, and the date and time of each visitor request.

This website also collects non-personally-identifying, anonymized records about which pages are viewed and when.

If you send us personal information through this website (say, through a donation form), it will be stored on our servers until we decide to delete it. You can request that we delete this information, in which case we'll delete it within 7 days.

This privacy policy may change from time to time. The date this policy was last updated will be posted on this page. Your continued use of this site after any change in this privacy policy will constitute your acceptance of such change.

Last updated: 20 March 2025
